articles.title: 1 killed after tornadoes were spotted in Oklahoma
articles.description: One person was killed Wednesday after severe storms ripped through southern Oklahoma, Marshall County emergency officials said.

articles.title: New York crematories overwhelmed by the number of dead get help from volunteers
articles.description: Crematoriums in hard hit areas of New York have a backlog of nearly a month and now volunteers are coming to their aid.

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: The healthiest way to brew your coffee -- and possibly lengthen your life
articles.description: Coffee can be amazingly good for you, as long as you brew it correctly. It may even lengthen your life,  if you prepare your coffee with a filter, according to a new long-term study.

articles.title: Trump: I told Georgia governor I disagree with decision to reopen
articles.description: President Trump said he told Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp that he disagreed strongly with his plan to reopen some businesses in the state during the coronavirus pandemic, but added, "He has to do what he thinks is right."

articles.title: What Trump and Fox News hosts said about hydroxychloroquine
articles.description: CNN's Brian Stelter says that Fox News hosts have been silent about a test that appears to link hydroxychloroquine to an increased death rate in Covid-19 patients after weeks of touting the drug as a treatment for the virus.

articles.title: Anderson Cooper presses Las Vegas mayor on reopening
articles.description: Las Vegas Mayor Carolyn Goodman (I) says she wants to reopen the city's casinos, restaurants and entertainment venues for business so people can get back to work. CNN's Anderson Cooper asks her if that's safe given the data about the Covid-19 pandemic.

articles.description: The story of one of the biggest music stars of our time is coming to the big screen. Clive Davis and Pat Houston are on board to produce a film currently titled "I Wanna Dance with Somebody," the story of singer Whitney Houston.
